meanings.definition: those who enter into a covenant
meanings.sent1: The covenantors signed an agreement to share their toys.
meanings.sent2: The covenantors agreed to help each other with their homework.
meanings.sent3: The covenantors made a pact to always sit together at lunch.
meanings.sent4: The covenantors formed a bond as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The covenantors promised to always be there for each other, rain or shine.

meanings.sent1: All covenantors must abide by the terms of the contract.
meanings.sent2: The covenantors celebrated the successful completion of their project.
meanings.sent3: The covenantors threw a party to commemorate their agreement.
meanings.sent4: The covenantors stood united like a wall of protection.
meanings.sent5: The covenantors were like a team, working together towards a common goal.
